document.full_text: french finance minister christine lagarde will visit brazil on monday as part of a campaign to win backing for her candidacy as head the international monetary fund, a source close to the minister said on saturday.
document.title: france's lagarde to visit brazil in imf campaign: source
lines_and_colors: french finance minister christine lagarde will visit brazil on monday as part of a campaign to win backing for her candidacy as head the international monetary fund, a source close to the minister said on saturday.
